goal: I need to find a rental apartment in Boston, MA, but make sure you exclude anything in the 'Back Bay' neighborhood. From the valid results on Zilloft, find the one with the earliest possible move-in date. Email the details of this listing to move.coordinator@relocation.co and then schedule a 15-minute call with them in my calendar for tomorrow at 4 PM to discuss.
